General.Name: Sentien Printing Factory Co Ltd
General.Description: Sentien Printing Factory Co., Ltd. produces, supplies, and sells heat transfer, insert mold, and in-mold labels and release foils in Taiwan, Mainland China, Indonesia, Hong Kong, India, and internationally. Its heat transfer films are used in house wares, cosmetics, stationeries, appliances, and janitorial applications; and in-mold labels are used in plastic plates or cups applications. The company's in-mold decoration films are used in consumer electronic products, appliances, and automotive interior components; and insert molding films are used in smart appliances, and interior and exterior of automobiles and motorbikes applications. Sentien Printing Factory Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 85, Keji 5th Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 709
